transcript: I would have liked to have gone a little further up the coast get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid of you missing.

segments.text: I would have liked to have gone a little further up the coast get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid of you missing.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I would have liked to have gone a little further up the coast to get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid we'd miss it.
